TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_trv_Bnrahan_Snlmean_(Knklaan_krkari), title = Bnrahan_Snlmean_(Knklaan_krkari), year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Seediq]}, url = {https://trv.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bnrahan_Snlmean_(Knklaan_krkari)} }

S.FORM: Kesun ta "Bnrahan Snlmean" (Kari Amerika: Linguistic reconstruction) we, spooda ta "Ooda psseung" mbarah smmalu kari uxe de kari pusu na krkari so uka pntasan cbeyo. Pngerah(*) we, pnstiyu daha kari wada bnrahan smmalu. Ooda mbarah smmalu Ooda mbarah smmalu psseung krkari lutuc we, kesun daha "Bnrahan snlmean pnsseengan" (Kari Amerika: Comparitive reconstruction), ncugil kesun daha "Bnrahan snlmean nganguc" (Kari Amerika: External reconstruction). Quri hnyegan ini pntena ga meniq truma kingal kari we, kesun daha "Bnrahan snlmean truma" (Kari Amerika: Internal reconstruction).

Keson ta "Bnrahan Snlmean" (Kari Amerika: Lingoistic reconstroction) we, spooda ta "Ooda psseong" mbarah smmalo kari oxe de kari poso na krkari so oka pntasan cbeyo. Pngerah(*) we, pnstiyo daha kari wada bnrahan smmalo. Ooda mbarah smmalo Ooda mbarah smmalo psseong krkari lotoc we, keson daha "Bnrahan snlmean pnsseengan" (Kari Amerika: Comparitive reconstroction), ncogil keson daha "Bnrahan snlmean ngangoc" (Kari Amerika: External reconstroction). Qori hnyegan ini pntena ga meniq troma kingal kari we, keson daha "Bnrahan snlmean troma" (Kari Amerika: Internal reconstroction).
